name: Assassin’s Creed® Nexus VR
summary:
95/100 – GamingTrend
9.5/10 – Real o Virtual
4.5/5 – Android Central
4/5 - Upload VR
9/10 – Shacknews
9/10 – Gaming Nexus

Experience the first AAA Assassin’s Creed built from the ground-up for VR.

Embody three legendary Assassins in this all-new full-length Assassin’s Creed action-adventure game that IGN calls “downright impressive.” Experience firsthand the thrill of parkour, the rush of combat, and the tension of stealth as you become the Assassin, working to stop Abstergo from gaining the power to...
